dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
4 bar scales on map given in "Miriametri", "Leghe comuni di Francia", "Miglia de giudea", "Schene d'Egitto".
Shows topography, drainage, territorial boundaries of the twelve tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
"Atl. geogr." -- top left corner ; "Tav. 44" -- top right corner.
